sentence.Network_en: For you are in Elysium, and you're already dead!
sentence.Network_cn: 那是因为你在天堂, 而且你已经阵亡了!

sentence.Network_en: For you are in Elysium, and you already dead!
sentence.Network_cn: 那是因为你已经去了天堂, 阵亡了!

sentence.Network_en: Joy , lovely divine light , Daughter of Elysium. Holy One, to thy holy kingdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢乐, 圣洁之光.你是极乐世界的女儿. 圣者将归于天堂!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《极乐世界》的故事发生在未来2159年,两大阶级的人泾渭分明:富人们生活在人造空间站Elysium(极乐世界),剩下的穷人们则人口过剩、遭到严重破坏的地球上苟延残喘。两.
elysian adj. 乐土的, 象天堂的, 幸福的elysium n. 极乐世界, 至福之境emaciated adj.瘦弱的*（*记）e+maci(瘦)+ate→瘦出去,使&#8.

means.word_mean: 1. a place or condition of ideal happiness
2. (Greek mythology) the abode of the blessed after death

auth_sentence.content: However, Elysium could be Pet Shop Boys' warmest, wisest album yet.

auth_sentence.content: The Greek underworld was called Hades, which was divided into realms of reward & punishment - Elysium & Tartarus.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Greek underworld was called Hades, which was divided into realms of reward & punishment - Elysium & Tartarus.

auth_sentence.content: The husband and another company, Elysium Diem Ltd, did not appear and were not represented.
